com.xmlmind.ditac.convert
Interface FOConverter

All Known Implementing Classes:
ExternalFOConverter
public interface FOConverter

Interface allowing the Converter to use the services of an XSL-FO processor such as Apache FOP, RenderX XEP, etc.

Method Summary
 void convertFO(File inFile, File outFile, Console console)
          Converts specified input XSL-FO file to specified output file.
 String getProcessorName()
          Returns the name of this XSL-FO processor, something very short like "FOP", "XEP", "XFC".
 Format getTargetFormat()
          Returns the format generated by this XSL-FO processor.
 

Method Detail

getProcessorName

String getProcessorName()
Returns the name of this XSL-FO processor, something very short like "FOP", "XEP", "XFC". Note that this name is passed as the value of the foProcessor ``system parameter'' to the XSLT stylesheets that generate XSL-FO.

getTargetFormat

Format getTargetFormat()
Returns the format generated by this XSL-FO processor.

convertFO

void convertFO(File inFile,
               File outFile,
               Console console)
               throws Exception
Converts specified input XSL-FO file to specified output file.

Parameters:
inFile - input XSL-FO file
outFile - output file
console - Console on which progress, trace, debug, etc, message can be displayed. May be null.
Throws:
Exception - if, for any reason, this operation fails
